duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver person-centered counseling, advocacy, and case management for patients.
Develop treatment plans identifying patient's voice, treatment strategies, and outcome measures.
Meet agency documentation standards and authorization requirements of contracts.
Strategically tailor effective clinical/case management services to meet diverse patient needs.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in a behavioral health related field. Washington State Agency Affiliated Counselor registration upon hire. Current Washington state driver’s license. Previous experience providing mental health counseling services preferred.
